ValidationRule.description: Impede que o usuário preencha o celular com valores do tipo (11) 11111-1111.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Permission.ByPassValidationRules) && (MobilePhone = '(11) 1111-1112'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 77777-7777'||MobilePhone ='(31) 11111-1111'|| MobilePhone ='(11) 1111-11119'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 33333-3333'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 9999-9999'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 2222-2222'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 55555-5555'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 1111-1111'|| MobilePhone ='(11) 1111-1111'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 7777-7777'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 4444-4444'|| MobilePhone ='(11) 11111-1111'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 44444-4444'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 99999-9999'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 3333-3333'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 5555-5555'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 8888-8888'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 88888-8888'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 6666-6666'|| MobilePhone ='(31) 66666-6666')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Por favor, insira um celular válido.
